alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Kingfisher; Logan; Noble; Payne (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 4:01AM CDT until July 21 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Kingfisher County in central Oklahoma... Southwestern Noble County in northern Oklahoma... Logan County in central Oklahoma... Western Payne County in central Oklahoma... Southeastern Garfield County in northern Oklahoma... * Until 445 AM CDT. * At 401 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Douglas to 5 miles southeast of Hennessey to 6 miles west of Kingfisher, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Stillwater, Guthrie, Perry, Kingfisher, Hennessey, Langston, Crescent, Dover, Coyle, Cedar Valley, Marshall, Mulhall, Cimarron City, Orlando, Meridian, Lake Carl Blackwell, Lake Mcmurtry, Lovell, and Bison. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
